CustomField.description: Created by: JA Purpose: Capture if an individual has reliable access to a laptop computer to use for class to better design classes and support services.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do they have consistent and reliable access to a laptop computer to use for class?
CustomField.label: Reliable Computer?

value.fullName: Yes, I use a Mac laptop that I own
value.label: Yes, I use a Mac laptop that I own

value.fullName: Yes, I use a PC laptop that I own
value.label: Yes, I use a PC laptop that I own

value.fullName: Yes, I use a Mac laptop that I borrowed
value.label: Yes, I use a Mac laptop that I borrowed

value.fullName: Yes, I use a PC laptop that I borrowed
value.label: Yes, I use a PC laptop that I borrowed

value.fullName: No, I do not have consistent and reliable access to a laptop computer I can use for class
value.label: No, I do not have consistent and reliable access to a laptop computer I can use for class

value.fullName: Yes, I/my family own a computer
value.label: Yes, I/my family own a computer

value.fullName: Yes, I/my family can borrow a computer
value.label: Yes, I/my family can borrow a computer

value.fullName: No, I do not have consistent and reliable access to a computer
value.label: No, I do not have consistent and reliable access to a computer
